key.name: qrencode-cmd
key.description: The data to be encoded is provided to this command as text through the standard input, and it must write an image to the standard output.

key.name: qrimage-cmd
key.summary: Command to decode QR codes from image files.
key.description: The command must read an image from standard input, and print the decoded URI to the standard output.

key.name: qrscan-cmd
key.summary: Command to scan QR codes from the webcam.
key.description: The command must print the decoded URI to the standard output.

key.name: clipboard-clear-delay
key.summary: Sensitive data is cleared from the clipboard after this many seconds.
key.description: When exporting sensitive data ("otpauth://" URIs) they will be cleared from the clipboard after this time has passed. Authentication codes are not cleared.

key.name: hide-locked
key.summary: Hide names from the menu when locked.
key.description: Note that the names are still visible to any application that wants to look into the Gnome Keyring.
